name: oj-player-card
displayName: Card to show Player and his details
description: A translatable high-level description for the component.

battingStyle.description: Batting Style of the current player

bowlingStyle.description: Bowling Style of the current player

cardClick.description: Triggered when a card is clicked and contains the player name and id of the clicked card.
